decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly build up devotion to green by playing a heavy amount of green permanents, allowing you to take advantage of powerful green devotion-based cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Invasion of Ixalan. By ramping up with Llanowar Elves, Elvish Mystic, and Wolfwillow Haven, you can quickly cast big threats like Cavalier of Thorns and Old-Growth Troll to overwhelm your opponent. Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner and Storm the Festival provide additional card advantage and help maintain pressure on your opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing a large variety of control spells and removal to dominate the game, while also taking advantage of card draw effects like Narset, Parter of Veils and Tinybones Joins Up to maintain card advantage. It also includes powerful finishers like The Meathook Massacre and Hopeless Nightmare to close out games. The mana base is carefully constructed to provide a good balance between black and blue sources, while also including utility lands like Field of Ruin and Castle Locthwain. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion adds additional value and flexibility to the deck.

The main concept of this Pioneer Merfolk Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively build a board presence using low-cost creatures like Silvergill Adept and Triton Shorestalker, supported by disruption spells like Fatal Push. The deck also focuses on controlling the opponent's resources with cards like Unholy Annex and Ritual Chamber while maintaining card advantage with Moon-Circuit Hacker. The unique addition of Kaito, Bane of Nightmares adds a powerful finisher to the deck, allowing for a swift victory against opponents.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive early game plays to pressure the opponent and disrupt their game plan. It utilizes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Torch the Tower to control the board while deploying threats like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to close out the game quickly. Thoughtseize and Duress are included to disrupt the opponent's hand and keep them off-balance. The deck also includes some versatile cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Fear of Missing Out to maintain card advantage and apply constant pressure.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays using low-cost creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It utilizes cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Heartfire Hero, and Kumano Faces Kakkazan to apply pressure early in the game. Reckless Rage and Fatal Push provide removal options to clear the opponent's board and make way for attacks. The inclusion of burn spells like Infuriate and Monstrous Rage allows for extra reach and damage potential. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast-paced aggression and efficient card synergies.

This deck focuses on assembling combos by discovering key pieces through card draw and ramp. Utilizing Leyline Binding and Greater Tanuki for control, with Quintorius Kand and Gyruda, Doom of Depths providing payoff for the combo pieces. Spark Double and Clever Impersonator can copy important creatures, while Virtue of Persistence helps to protect them. The mana base is varied to ensure the right colors are available when needed. Overall, the strategy is to search for and assemble powerful combos to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.
